ingredients.ingredient: 2 Â½ cups Italian-style tipo 00 flour, plus additional for dusting

cookingTips: Tipo 00 flour is finer than all-purpose and produces silkier pasta dough
Knead dough for at least 10 minutes to develop gluten for proper texture
Roll dough thin by hand using gentle, consistent pressure in all directions
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through proper hand-kneading technique and the importance of developing gluten for authentic pasta texture.
